mapper.select: SELECT F_WTM_GET_EMP_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, 'ORG_CD', F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) AS orgNm , A.SABUN AS sabun , B.EMP_NM AS empNm , SUM(TOT_MINUTE) AS totMinute , SUM(TOT_MINUTE) - SUM(REST_MINUTE) AS useMinute FROM WTM_COMP_CREATE A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND B.EYMD = '29991231' WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND SUBSTR(A.YMD,1,4) = #{sYy} GROUP BY orgNm, sabun, empNm

SELECT ymd , OT_MINUTE AS otMinute , ADD_MINUTE AS addMinute , TOT_MINUTE AS totMinute , REST_MINUTE AS restMinute , ALLOW_MINUTE AS allowMinute , symd , eymd FROM WTM_COMP_CREATE A WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.SABUN = #{sabun} AND SUBSTR(A.YMD,1,4) = #{sYy} ORDER BY YMD
